task.title: Assigning a nickname
task.shortdesc: You can assign a nicknames to your contacts. Nicknames are visible throughout the app in place of the users' formal names.

context.p: If two people in your contact list have the same first and last names, you can assign one or each person an unique nickname.

step.cmd: Click the menu icon ( ) in the navigator and select Contacts.
Locate the contact that you want to assign a nickname.
Click the menu icon next to the persons name and click Edit nickname.
In the name field, type the nickname and click the check mark.
